MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:59pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations are required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:22 AM on Sunday, 21 March 2021.
